amendment.description: At the end of division D (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XXX. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance that references or relies on the analysis contained in-- (1) "Technical Support Document:***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 59 printed in House Report 115-259 to prohibit the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance related to the social cost of carbon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
